title: Give me your tired, your poor, your...N172 Old Judges

posts.post_title: Give me your tired, your poor, your...N172 Old Judges
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joseph
Greetings,

I'm looking to acquire several (3-5) sad condition N172 Old Judges. My only
criterion for condition is that the card have most of the advertising elements intact, ie, name & team, Old Judge, copyright line, goodwin, etc...Otherwise the cards can be trimmed, torn, faded, creased, taped, holed, re-backed, rodent-nibbled, etc. 

My budget for these 3-5 cards is $100-$200. Is this possible?

posts.post_title: Give me your tired, your poor, your...N172 Old Judges
posts.post_content:
Posted By: J Levine
Joseph,
$100 to $200 each? Or for all 3-5?

Joshua
